EmailTemplate.description: Partnership Dialogue Series School Save the Date Syracuse NY 4-2008
EmailTemplate.name: Partnership Dialogue Series School Save the Date Syracuse, NY 4-2008
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date - ASA Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Save the date!
Keep up with some of the latest happenings in the financial aid industry. National FFELP guarantor American Student Assistance® has designed a dialogue series to discuss some of the hottest topics affecting financial aid offices!
As part of our Partnership Dialogue Series, we’re proud to host an exchange among our colleagues in Syracuse, NY on April 17 ,2008. In this upcoming series, we will explore the challenges of effectively communicating with students and families today. With the overwhelming array of media available, ranging from podcasts to phone calls and text messages, which methods do you feel comfortable using? And which methods are the most effective for your millennial students and Baby Boomer parents?
Our Partnership Dialogue Series will afford you the opportunity to join in an interactive presentation followed by round table discussions. Be educated, ask questions, and receive feedback from colleagues American Student Assistance on one of the hottest topics affecting financial aid offices across the country.
Agenda: 8:00am Continental Breakfast 9:00am School and Lender Session 12:00pm Lunch 1:00pm Adjourn
April 17, 2008 Sherwood Inn 26 W.Genesee Street Skaneateles, New York 13152 (315) 685-3405 http://www.thesherwoodinn.com/
Continental breakfast and lunch will be provided.
For more information please contact
Joseph Martinlovic Business Development American Student Assistance 800-999-9080 Ext. 6018
jmartinkovic@amsa.com www.amsa.com
April 17, 2008
Please join us!
8:00am - 1:00pm Continental breakfast and lunch will be provided
How to register or for additional information, including driving directions

April 17, 2008 8:00am - 1:00pm Sherwood Inn 26 W.Genesee Street Skaneateles, New York 13152 http://www.thesherwoodinn.com/
